Container.Name: Terraria-tModloader
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install Terraria and the tModloader and run it. SERVER PASSWORD: Docker
ATTENTION: The Container will check on every start/restart if there is a newer version of the game available and install it if so.
Update Notice: Change the game version to whatever version do you want and restart the container.
WEB CONSOLE: You can connect to the Terraria console by opening your browser and go to HOSTIP:9013 (eg: 192.168.1.1:9013) or click on WebUI on the Docker page within Unraid.
